modules.serial_labware.IKA_RET_Stirrer.IKA_RET_Control_Visc module¶

:mod:”IKA_RET_Control_Visc” – API for IKA RET Control Visc remote controllable hotplate stirrer¶

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This provides a python class for the IKA RET Control Visc Hotplates based on software developed by the Cronin Group. The command implementation is based on the english manual: English manual version: 20000004159, RET control-visc_112015 Pages 31 - 34, the german version, same file pages 15 - 18 appears to contain more and better information.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

class modules.serial_labware.IKA_RET_Stirrer.IKA_RET_Control_Visc.IKARETControlVisc(port=None, device_name=None, connect_on_instantiation=False, soft_fail_for_testing=False)[source]¶

Bases: SerialDevice.serial_labware.SerialDevice

This provides a python class for the IKA RET Control Visc Hotplates The command implementation is based on the english manual: English manual version: 20000004159, RET control-visc_112015, Pages 31 - 34,

the german version, same file pages 15 - 18 appears to contain more and better information.

property software_version¶

Returns the software version of the firmware !!!WARNING!!! Despite being documented this does not seem to work as intended, it just returns an empty string :return: (supposed to…) software version of the firmware

property stir_rate_pv¶

Reads the process variable (i.e. the current) stir rate :return: call back to send_message with a request to return and check a value

property stir_rate_sp¶

Reads the set point (target) for the stir rate :return: call back to send_message with a request to return and check a value

property temperature_hot_plate_safety_pv¶

This is a documented function and does return values, but I cannot figure out what it’s supposed to be… :return: excellent question…

property temperature_hot_plate_safety_sp¶
This returns the current safety temperature set point. There is no equivalent setter function (for obvious

safety reasons, it actually does not exist in the firmware)

Returns

The current setting of the hot plate safety temperature
